original_title: Shaun White: Wizard of Winter Games
overview: Shaun White: Wizard of Winter Games is a documentary providing a rare glimpse into the heart and mind of one of the world's most internationally-known celebrity athletes. This is a most up-close-and-personal profile of the young, influential and charismatic Shaun White, known lovingly as "The Flying Tomato" for his long, flowing bright orange hair and his unbelievable acrobatics.
title: Shaun White: Wizard of Winter Games
